messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] QUESTION?? NEED HELP & ADVICE! CHOOSING an ISP DSL or CABLE MODEM....
messages.msgSnippet: Greetings~ My husband works for Charter communications and he installs cable modems for cable based internet.  If it would help I can have him email you
messages.messageBody:
Greetings~
My husband works for Charter communications and he installs cable modems
for cable based internet. If it would help I can have him email you tonight
to answer your questions and get things hooked up properly. Just email me
the questions, ok?
Shoshana
----- Original Message -----
From: "squeek_files" <squeekfiles@...>
To: <Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, November 05, 2002 9:25 PM
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] QUESTION?? NEED HELP & ADVICE! CHOOSING an ISP
DSL or CABLE MODEM....
